projects.title: Deplora
projects.description: A platform for managing deployment plans, providing users with an intuitive platform to oversee application deployments.

projects.title: Library Management System
projects.description: A web-based application designed to streamline library operations, providing an efficient platform for managing resources.

projects.title: SPM Agile Assistant Chatbot
projects.description: An AI assistant built using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) to provide intelligent and context-aware answers to Agile-related queries.

projects.title: VoteZone Frontend
projects.description: An application to create and manage elections with a clean and intuitive interface.

projects.title: Training Ramp Up
projects.description: A full-stack web application designed to manage user and student data. User authentication and authorization are implemented to ensure data security.
